experience.title: experience
experience.description:
From 2021, I started to acquire deep knowledge in the field of IT. My interest in technology has driven me to develop and learn new skills every day. Since 2022, I have been working as a freelancer, gaining valuable experience by independently handling various projects.

In 2023, I dedicated myself entirely to web programming. Since then, I have worked on a variety of projects, including:


  • Landing Page Websites: Created high-quality landing pages that attract buyers and boost sales.
  • CRM Systems: Developed CRM systems to help businesses effectively manage and establish customer relationships.
  • Telegram Bots: Built various functional bots for interactive communication with users.
  • Computer Programs: Developed applications tailored to both corporate and personal needs.

Currently, I am a Full Stack Web Developer, proficient in both frontend and backend technologies. I have extensive experience in crafting complex web software solutions.

Through continuous engagement with cutting-edge technologies and constant learning, I approach each project with innovation and efficiency. My goal is to deeply understand each client's needs and deliver top-notch services.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
Technical Skills


Frontend Technologies:

  • HTML5: For semantic markups and SEO optimization.
  • CSS3: Advanced CSS3 capabilities for styling and creating design elements.
  • Sass: Sass preprocessor for handling complex CSS codes.
  • JavaScript (JS): For creating interactive and dynamic websites.
  • Bootstrap: For fast and responsive designs.
  • ReactJS: To create Single Page Applications (SPA).


Backend Technologies:

  • JavaScript (Node.js): Server-side programming.
  • Python: For creating backend services and scripts.


Databases:

  • PostgreSQL: Relational database.
  • MySQL: Common database manager.
  • MongoDB: NoSQL database.


Special Applications:

  • Telegram Bots: Creating bots to communicate with users.
  • Windows Applications: Developing programs for the Windows platform.

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description:
I bring a diverse set of soft skills that complement my technical expertise, enabling me to effectively collaborate and innovate in any project environment. Here are some key soft skills I possess:


  • Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills, enabling clear and effective interactions with clients, team members, and stakeholders.
  • Problem-Solving: Strong analytical abilities to identify issues and develop creative solutions efficiently.
  • Time Management: Proven ability to prioritize tasks and manage time effectively to meet deadlines and deliver quality work.
  • Teamwork: Experience working in diverse teams, demonstrating flexibility, reliability, and a collaborative spirit.
  • Adaptability: Quick to adapt to new technologies, tools, and processes, staying agile in a fast-changing environment.
  • Leadership: Capable of leading projects and guiding teams towards achieving common goals with a focus on quality and efficiency.
  • Attention to Detail: Meticulous in ensuring the accuracy and quality of work, consistently delivering high-standard results.

These soft skills enhance my ability to not only execute technical tasks but also to engage effectively with various stakeholders, driving successful project outcomes and fostering positive professional relationships.

bio.title: bio
bio.description: I am a 21-year-old enthusiastic programmer with a deep passion for coding and technology. Currently, I am honing my skills in backend development using Node.js and exploring various new concepts and technologies. My primary goal is to achieve high-level proficiency in programming and to excel in the field by consistently expanding my knowledge and tackling challenging projects. I am committed to continuous learning and innovation, striving to make significant strides in my programming career.

interests.title: interests
interests.description:
My interests extend beyond programming and reflect a broad curiosity about technology and the digital world. Here are some areas that I am particularly passionate about:


  • Software Development: I enjoy exploring new programming languages, frameworks, and tools to create innovative software solutions.
  • Web Development: I have a keen interest in designing and building interactive, user-friendly websites and web applications.
  • Artificial Intelligence: The potential of AI fascinates me, and I am eager to learn how it can be leveraged to solve real-world problems.
  • Cybersecurity: Understanding the intricacies of protecting data and systems from cyber threats is an area I find intriguing.
  • Open Source Contribution: I am passionate about contributing to open-source projects and being part of the collaborative developer community.
  • Gaming and Game Development: I love gaming and am interested in the process of creating engaging and immersive game experiences.
  • Continuous Learning: I am dedicated to lifelong learning, whether it's through online courses, reading tech blogs, or attending workshops and conferences.

These interests fuel my motivation and creativity, inspiring me to push the boundaries of what I can achieve in the tech world.

education.title: education
education.description:

sports.title: sports
sports.description:
I am an avid sports enthusiast with a passion for both playing and watching various sports. Here are some of the sports I enjoy:


  • Soccer: Playing soccer not only helps me stay fit but also enhances my teamwork and strategic thinking skills.
  • Basketball: I love the fast-paced nature of basketball and the coordination required to excel at the game.
  • Running: Long-distance running is my go-to activity for building endurance and clearing my mind.
  • Swimming: Swimming offers a perfect blend of relaxation and a full-body workout.

Sports play a significant role in my life, helping me maintain a healthy balance between physical activity and mental focus.

favorite-games.title: favorite-games
favorite-games.description:
I am a passionate gamer with a love for diverse genres and immersive gameplay. Here are some of my favorite games:


  • The Witcher 3: An epic RPG with a rich storyline and stunning open world that captivates me every time.
  • Valorant: A tactical first-person shooter that challenges my strategic thinking and team coordination.
  • Among Us: A fun and engaging social deduction game that’s perfect for playing with friends.
  • League of Legends: A highly competitive MOBA where strategy and teamwork are crucial to victory.
  • Minecraft: Endless creativity and exploration in a sandbox environment.

Gaming is more than just a hobby for me; it's a way to unwind, challenge myself, and connect with a global community of players.
